---
category: news
title: "AI algorithms can influence people's voting and dating decisions in experiments"
excerpt: "In a new series of experiments, artificial intelligence (A.I.) algorithms were able to influence people's preferences for fictitious political candidates or potential romantic partners, depending on whether recommendations were explicit or covert."
